nodes.text: Salline was a location on the planet Chandrila. In 27 BBY, the publication Bormea Today conducted an interview in Salline with local sensation Senator Mon Mothma, who had recently been elected to represent Chandrila in the Galactic Republic's Galactic Senate.

Salline was first mentioned in the new Star Wars canon in the 2018 reference book Star Wars: The Rebel Files, which was written by Daniel Wallace. It originated in the Star Wars Legends continuity, where it was first mentioned in the 2014 reference book Star Wars: Imperial Handbook: A Commander's Guide, which was also written by Wallace.
